name: track
description: `npm run dev` on the client to start the vite dev server.

scripts.prod: cd ./docker && docker-compose --file ./docker-compose.prod.yml up --force-recreate --remove-orphans --build server database store client test-database
scripts.dev-build: cd ./docker && docker-compose --file ./dev.yml up --force-recreate --remove-orphans --build server database store client test-database
scripts.db: docker exec -it docker_database_1 psql rack -U postgres
scripts.test-db: docker exec -it docker_test-database_1 psql rack-test -U postgres -p 5434
